org.microbean.freemarker.mojo

Class FreemarkerMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo

    @Mojo(name="freemarker")
public class FreemarkerMojo
extends AbstractMojo
    Generates a document from a Freemarker template.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws MojoExecutionException
        Executes the freemarker goal.
        Throws:
        MojoExecutionException - if a fatal error occured

      • getOutputFile

        protected File getOutputFile(String templateName)
        Returns a File representing the path where the output of processing a Freemarker template with the supplied templateName should be deposited.

        This method never returns null.

        Overrides of this method must not return null.

        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of a Freemarker template; must not be null
        Returns:
        a non-null File representing the path where the output of processing a Freemarker template with the supplied templateName should be deposited
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if templateName is null
        See Also:
        getDefaultOutputFile(String), getOutputFile()

      • getDefaultOutputFile

        protected File getDefaultOutputFile(String templateName)
        Returns a File representing the default location for the output from the processing of a Freemarker template with the supplied templateName.

        This method never returns null.

        Overrides of this method must not return null.

        This implementation returns a new File formed from a concatenation of the default Maven project build directory and the supplied templateName, minus its .ftl suffix (if it has one).

        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of the template for which an output file should be returned; must not be null
        Returns:
        a non-null File representing the default location for the output from the processing of a Freemarker template with the supplied templateName
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if templateName is null
        See Also:
        getProjectBuildDirectory(), getOutputFile(String)

      • getProjectBuildDirectory

        protected final File getProjectBuildDirectory()
        A convenience method that returns a File representing the default Maven build directory.

        This method never returns null.

        The File returned by this method is guaranteed to be a directory.

        Returns:
        a non-null File representing a directory that is the default Maven build directory
        See Also:
        BuildBase.getDirectory()

      • isSkip

        public boolean isSkip()
        Returns true if an invocation of the execute() method should do nothing.
        Returns:
        true if an invocation of the execute() method should do nothing; false otherwise
        See Also:
        setSkip(boolean), execute()

      • setSkip

        public void setSkip(boolean skip)
        Sets whether an invocation of the execute() method should do nothing.
        Parameters:
        skip - if true, an invocation of the execute() method should do nothing
        See Also:

      • getTemplateName

        public String getTemplateName()
        Returns the name of the Freemarker template to process.

        This method may return null.

        Overrides of this method are permitted to return null.

        Returns:
        the name of the Freemarker template to process, or null
        See Also:
        setTemplateName(String)

      • getTemplateNames

        protected Set<String> getTemplateNames(Configuration configuration)
        Returns a Set of names of Freemarker templates to process.

        This method never returns null.

        Overrides of this method must not return null.

        Parameters:
        configuration - a Configuration that might be inspected for its TemplateLoader; may be null
        Returns:
        a non-null, unmodifiable Set of template names
        See Also:
        getTemplateName()

      • setTemplateName

        public void setTemplateName(String templateName)
        Sets the name of the Freemarker template to process.

        Note that the interpretation of this name is the domain solely of the TemplateLoader installed as part of the Configuration defining the Freemarker environment.

        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of the Freemarker template to process; may be null
        See Also:
        getTemplateName(), Configuration.setTemplateLoader(TemplateLoader), TemplateLoader

      • getModelFactories

        public Map<String,ModelFactory> getModelFactories()
        Returns a Map of the ModelFactory instances to be used by a BeansWrapper indexed by the names of the Classes to which they apply.

        This method may return null.

        Returns:
        a Map of the ModelFactory instances to be used by a BeansWrapper indexed by the names of the Classes to which they apply, or null
        See Also:
        setModelFactories(Map)

      • setModelFactories

        public void setModelFactories(Map<String,ModelFactory> modelFactories)

        Parameters:
        modelFactories - the Map to use; may be null
        See Also:
        getModelFactories()
